issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
*Problem description*
We have working app on Android/IOS same project we tried to run on Tizen emulator, app throws error before slash only.
we are using local database which is not able to install on tizen Platform.

*Error*
{code}TypeError: 'undefined' is not an object at /app.js (line 8){code}
fields.summary: Tizen: Not able to install local database using titanium application
fields.environment:
Titanium Command-Line Interface, CLI version 3.1.0, Titanium SDK version 3.1.0.GA
Tizen 2.0

comments.body:
Hi mutturaj,

To help us fix this, is it possible for you to provide a simple test case which reproduces the problem? Maybe by doing that will also help narrow down the cause.

Thanks!
